config.script:
try:
		system.perspective.print('in resident row click')
		for item in range(len(self.props.data)):
			
			if item == event.row:
				self.props.data[item].style.classes = 'Table/Row_Select'
			else:
				self.props.data[item].style.classes = 'Table/Cell_Dashboard'
		selectedColumn = self.props.selection.selectedColumn
		if selectedColumn == "Options":
			participantID = self.props.selection.data[0]['participantId']
			id = "PreviewParticipant" 
			params = {"participantID":participantID}
			system.perspective.openDock(id=id,params=params)
		else:
			# send message to edit resident view
			checkInId = event.value['id']
			bedId = event.value["bedId"]
			participantId = event.value["participantId"]
			roomId = event.value["roomId"]
			checkInDate = event.value["eventStart"]
			participantName = event.value["name"]
			roomName = event.value["roomName"]
			bedName = event.value["bedName"]
			system.perspective.print('sending msg')
			system.perspective.sendMessage("residentselected",payload = {'facilityId': self.view.params.facilityID,'checkInId':checkInId,'bedId':bedId, 'participantId':participantId, 'roomId':roomId, 'participantName':participantName, 'checkInDate':checkInDate, 'roomName': roomName, 'bedName':bedName},scope="session")
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Shelter Current Resident")
		logger.error("Error with Participant Preview")

table_data = []
	
		#Iterate over the results of the query
	for row in range(value.getRowCount()):
			row_struct = {}
			row_data = {}
			style = {}	
			#Map query results into correct attributes
			
			row_data['name'] = value.getValueAt(row, "name")
			row_data['gender'] = value.getValueAt(row, "gender")
			row_data['race'] = value.getValueAt(row, "race")
			row_data['age'] = value.getValueAt(row, "age")
			row_data['program'] = value.getValueAt(row, "program")
			row_data['notes'] = value.getValueAt(row, "notes")
			row_data['dateadded'] = value.getValueAt(row, "dateadded")
			row_data['participantId'] = value.getValueAt(row, "participantId")
			row_data['Options'] = ''
			#Set the default style for the row
			style['classes'] = "Table/Cell_Dashboard"
			row_struct['value'] = row_data
			row_struct['style'] = style
			#Append the individual row date to the table data object
			table_data.append(row_struct)
				
	return table_data

	system.perspective.print(payload) 
	#self.view.custom.searchPayload = payload['searchText']

	returnDataset = []
	oneRow = []
	
	headers = ["name", "participantid", "program", "dateadded","gender","race","age","notes"]
	originaldataset = self.custom.sqlData
	searchText = payload['searchText'].lower()
	#system.perspective.print('##########searcthText##############') 
	system.perspective.print(searchText) 
	if searchText != "":
		system.perspective.print('#searchText not blank#')
		for i in range (originaldataset.getRowCount()):
			for j in [0,2,7]:
				oneRow = []
				#system.perspective.print('##########beforeIfCondition##############')
				system.perspective.print(str(i)+ " " +str(j))
				system.perspective.print(originaldataset.getValueAt(i,j))
				cellValue = originaldataset.getValueAt(i,j)
#				if originaldataset.getValueAt(i,1).lower().find(searcthText) != -1 or originaldataset.getValueAt(i,2).lower().find(searcthText) != -1 or originaldataset.getValueAt(i,4).lower().find(searcthText) != -1 or originaldataset.getValueAt(i,8).lower().find(searcthText) != -1 or originaldataset.getValueAt(i,10).lower().find(searcthText) != -1 or str(originaldataset.getValueAt(i,12)).lower().find(searcthText) != -1:
				if cellValue!=None:
					system.perspective.print("not none")
					if str(cellValue).lower().find(searchText) != -1 :
						#system.perspective.print('##########IfCondition##############')
						oneRow = [originaldataset.getValueAt(i,0),originaldataset.getValueAt(i,1),originaldataset.getValueAt(i,2),originaldataset.getValueAt(i,3),originaldataset.getValueAt(i,4),originaldataset.getValueAt(i,5),originaldataset.getValueAt(i,6),originaldataset.getValueAt(i,7)]
						returnDataset.append(oneRow)
						break
					else:
						system.perspective.print('##No match###') 
		#system.perspective.print('##########end for##############')
		#self.props.data = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, returnDataset)
		self.custom.filterdData = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, returnDataset)
	
	else:
		system.perspective.print('##Search text blank###')
		#self.props.data = originaldataset
		self.custom.filterdData = originaldataset
